prins gunasekarakatharagamadi ada ha heta pawathwena marathan, awidima ha papadi tharagawalata sahabhagiwana siyalu kridaka kridikawanta ee.si.ji.parikshanaya aniwarya kirimata krida amathyanshaya thiranaya kota atha.kridaka kridikawange yogyathawa pariksha kirimakin thorawa tharagawalata idiripathwimata awasthawa nodena bawa krida adhyaksha jenaral ranjani jayakodi mahathmiya sandahan kalaya.pasugiya kalaya pura marathan ha anekuth tharaga kihipayakadima awasanawantha siduwim wuye kridaka kridikawan tharagayata sahabhagiwimata pera yogyatha parikshanayak sidu nokirime hethuwen bawa heliwa thibe.jathika krida ulele marathan, awidima ha papadi tharagawalata kridaka kridikawan wishala pirisak ekwana heyin krida waidya aayathanaye pradhani mahacharya arjuna da silwa mahathage upades paridi waidya mandalayaka sewaya labi atha.
